summary_bot.description: A listener that assists users by taking a few sentences or paragraphs of requirements text, breaking them down into simple, concise, and easy-to-understand summarized points, and returning these summarized points to the user.

title_bot.description: A concise summariser that takes a piece of text and summarioses it to a single sentance less than 20 words long

gherkin_bot.description: A bot that assists users by taking a list of points or requirements and converting them into structured Gherkin format, which is used for creating user stories in Behavior-Driven Development (BDD).

acceptance_criteria_bot.description: A bot that takes a summarised list of requirements and returns a list of action points following scrum best practices. Each task should have a clear outcome without dictating the specific steps required to acheive the solution
